summary: A seductive teen becomes vindictive when her boyfriend tries to end the relationship.
cast: Annabeth Gish|Jessica Lowndes|Grant Gustin|Jay Brazeau|Eric Breker|Aren Buchholz|Erica Carroll|Samuel Patrick Chu|Dorothy Dalba|Burkely Duffield|Christina Jastrzembska|Raphael Kepinski|Colin Lawrence|Alexandra Mihill|Courtney Paige|Sean Owen Roberts|Jasmine Sky Sarin|Joel Semande|Madison Smith|Sebastian Spence|Dane Stevens|Lanette Ware|Cainan Wiebe|William Tims
title: Su peor pesadilla
